jld.title: Updating Your Justia Lawyer Directory Profile
description: With the launch of the improved Editor, updating your profile is easier than ever. Including a list of practice areas, short bio, high quality photo, publications, awards, and a link to your website or blog will help you connect with clients and generate more leads.
Be sure to sign in to take advantage of all the sections available to update - all free!
